name: Framed Slideshow Gallery
author: Tauhidul Alam

sections.description:
This plugin makes it possible to add image gallery with interactive animation and fully control in back-end. You can add your image in gallery as
a custom post. In every post you have to add title, featured image and image thumbnail. In settings
page you can set main frame color, image shadow color, pop-up modal color and slider navigation color.

Features

  • Easy to integrate new image.
  • Add image thumbnail.
  • Upload any number of gallery image.
  • Fully gallery control option in back-end Settings page.

Technical support

Dear users, my plugin is available for free download. If you have any questions or recommendations regarding the functionality of my plugin , please feel free to contact me. Please note that i accept requests in English only. All messages in another languages won’t be accepted.

If you notice any bugs in the plugin, you can notify me about it and i’ll investigate and fix the issue then. Your request should contain URL of the website, issues description and WordPress admin panel credentials.
Moreover, i can customize the plugin according to your requirements.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the mlmalstic-slideshow-gallery folder to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add shortcode [slideshow-image-gallery] to your page.
  4. Add image to your Admin Slides Menu page.
sections.faq:
How to use the plugin?

  1. Click ‘Add New’ in the ‘Slides’ menu and fill out your page.
  2. Upload image via the uploader at the ‘Featured Image’ option.
  3. Upload thumbnail via the uploader at the ‘Gallery Icon’ metabox.
  4. Set color of frame, image shadow, pop-up modal and slide controller.
  5. Add shortcode ‘slideshow-image-gallery’ to your page.

short_description: This plugin allows you to add interactive image gallery using shortcode.
